name: Jame Purple
description:
Help Jame avenge against The Evil Mage in this short top down shooter!

Jame Purple is a small game where you help Jame, the result of an experiment made by The Evil Mage, and now have two entities in one body.

The player needs to flip between those entities while avoiding enemies and traps.
Controls:

WASD: character movement.

Space: Change character.

Mouse direction and left-click: Shooting directions and shooting trigger.

Credits:

Programming: TheCoffee

Soundtrack: Theo

Sprites, sound effects: Bolo

Background, tilesets, assets, sprites: LynxFlake

Concept art, rooms layout, title and game over screen: Buxie

PS: The game has several bugs.

This is a submission for GMTK 2022.
